about_the_game:
Welcome to the warehouse!

The main character is a journalist who goes to a fulfillment warehouse to record a documentary. He had never been to warehouses, but he had heard many scary stories about what was happening there: how an employee was sucked into a conveyor belt, how a person was sorted and shipped in a box during the sorting of goods, how cutlets were made in the dining room from an employee who did not fulfill the norm for placing goods...

Ominous SEASON!

The warehouse guards look strange and aggressive, and the warehouse operators behave like madmen, there is a mess around and tense stares from the workers. This is not the apocalypse, this is the sales season, which the warehouse cannot cope with and the only thing that can help is a new sacrifice to the spirit of the warehouse. Who will be chosen for this role?

Endless shelving.

If you are not careful enough and accidentally get to the paranormal floor, then you will find yourself in the most eerie place in the warehouse - rows of shelves leading nowhere. The same type of shelving shelves, the incessant light of fluorescent lamps and approximately 1.5 million m2 of randomly constructed shelving alleys. And God forbid if you hear the voices of the security service nearby, because it means that they already see you.

During the game, you will encounter various dangers, riddles and guards who will try to stop you from revealing the terrible truth about the warehouse. Will you be able to survive and make your own movie, or will you become another victim of warehouse madness?

Game Features:

  • Terrifying atmosphere and intense gameplay
  • Realistic graphics
  • Immersive voice acting in the history of the warehouse
  • Existential horror
  • Free warehouse research
  • First-person view

Try not to make your trip to the warehouse your last.

name: Escape From Warehouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or bette
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: The journalist goes to the warehouse to record a documentary, but becomes a witness to creepy stories. The guards and warehouse workers look very strange. What is really hidden behind the endless shelves and how not to become a victim of the warehouse?
